Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Potassium channel toxin Hge-beta-KTx (HgebetaKTx; Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Long chain scorpion toxin family (Class 2 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: The full peptide presents antibacterial and cytotoxic activities. The C-terminus (33-76aa) blocks potassium channels Kv1.1/KCNA1, Kv1.2/KCNA2, and Kv1.3/KCNA3.
